title: Commodore 64
material_description: Commodore 64 video game console/keyboard, datasette, manual and cables
brief_description: Commodore 64 Video Game Console. (For console on display game is emulated by a concealed PC). Also includes Commodore C64 keyboard, ‘Commodore 64 User Manual’, ‘Commodore 64 Computing’ book by Ian Sinclair, ‘C2N Cassette Unit Operating Instructions’ booklet, plug, cable and cover.
